subject: Horse Racing
Cruelty to Animals
Horses
lead_paragraph: Ernie Paragallo, the prominent New York thoroughbred owner and breeder, was to appear at a hearing as he faced 22 counts of animal cruelty.
snippet: Ernie Paragallo, the prominent New York thoroughbred owner and breeder, was to appear at a hearing as he faced 22 counts of animal cruelty.
